text: László Várkonyi was a male former international table tennis player from Hungary. ==Table tennis career== He won three medals at the World Table Tennis Championships from 1949 to 1952. The three World Championship medals included two gold medal in the team event. He was nicknamed Laci. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Hungarian male table tennis players Category:1908 births Category:Year of death missing Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: László Várkonyi
